posts.post_text: December 15, 2020 at 12:37 PM#2well what is your variable in this situation? is it a number? this syntax will work if the variable is a number.is it "effect #?"if the variable is "effect 5" for example, you will need to use:"assign effect $'currentfxslot' /wings =2

title: Effect
